comment:
Extracted Variables:
- x: number of small suitcases
- y: number of large suitcases

Definitions:
- x: number of small suitcases to be sent
- y: number of large suitcases to be sent

Constraints:
1. x \geq 2y (At least twice as many small suitcases as large suitcases must be used)
2. x \leq 70 (Available at most 70 small suitcases)
3. y \leq 50 (Available at most 50 large suitcases)
4. y \geq 15 (Must send at least 15 large suitcases)
5. x + y \leq 70 (Can send at most 70 suitcases in total)

Objective:
Maximize Z = 50x + 80y (Maximize the total number of snacks that can be delivered)
